name: Peter Paper
description:
Peter Paper is a horror survival game set in the house of the child you are babysitting. With the child's parents gone for the night you put the child to bed and find a strange VCR tape sitting on the table in the living room. Strange you don't remember seeing it there before, you pick it up and put it in the tape player. To your horror a monster by the name Peter Paper emerges from the TV. 

You have to explore the dark house armed only with a flashlight and find items that randomly spawn throughout the house to win. All the while, Peter Paper is trying to catch you. The longer you survive the more tricky Peter becomes, he gains the ability to slide under doors and can turn sideways to appear invisible.

The game play and aesthetic is similar to titles like Resident Evil (Without the use of weapons), Baldi's Basics, and Slender.

*This game was developed during quarantine using a mix of assets created by us and Kenney.nl.

**If the game is popular enough we would love to expand the game play and create all new assets to really amp up the horror vibe. Comment down below letting us know if you want us to take this game further!
